title: Voluntary limitation of license
context: ยง453-8.1 Voluntary limitation of license. A physician, osteopathic physician, or surgeon may request, in writing, that the board limit the individual&rsquo;s license to practice. The board may grant the request and may impose conditions on the limited license. The board shall determine whether and when the limitation shall be removed. [L 1976, c 219, pt of ยง14; am L 1983, c 92, pt of ยง1(6); am L 2008, c 5, ยง12]
